rules_text:
[i]Preparation[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve gained life or created a token this turn, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.
Legacy {2}{G} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its legacy cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: [i]Preparation[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve gained life or created a token this turn, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.
